name: Dream Golf VR
description: Looking for a mini golf experience that'll remind you of the real thing? Look no further!!! Download FREE today!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
